alert.note: Alert for Crockett; Gibson; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:08PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Crockett, southeastern Gibson and northern Madison Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 308 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Adair, or 9 miles west of Jackson, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Humboldt, Milan, Fairview, Bells, Three Way, Adair, Carroll, Medina, Gadsden, Gibson, Fruitvale, Youngs Crossing, West, Huntersville, Gum Flat, Roberts, Windy City, Gilmore and Mason Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for west Tennessee.
